<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Signet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1073)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 189 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This obsidian ring allows you to partially warp your spells through the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11), allowing them to strike directly at a target's body.

<document level="2" id="action-863" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
